data.actual_result: Your in-app settings reset themselves (such as voice settings)
data.expected_result: If you set your voice settings to push to talk and then update the app your setting will be saved therefore they won't change.
data.short_description: Short description: Updating the discord app resets your App Settings (Possibly applies to more than just Voice settings)
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your app settings to something (ex. "Push to Talk") - Wait for the next update
